title: Interpretation of seeing zucchini joy in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing something of joy in a dream or a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam Al-Sadiq. The man and the young man. What is the interpretation of seeing a cup of joy in a dream: Seeing a cup of joy in a dream is a sign of the presence of major problems and pressures in the dreamer’s life. Seeing the presence of joy in a dream is an indication of the dreamer’s desire and desire for intercourse and marriage. See also: Interpretation of seeing equipment for joy in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing Joy in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing joy in a dream by Ibn Sirin is a sign of facing some changes in the dreamer’s life that will change it for the better. Seeing the presence of joy in a dream is a sign of stress, tension and mental fatigue. Seeing joy in a dream indicates the presence of a serious financial crisis in the life of the one who saw the vision and an attempt to overcome it and get rid of it. Seeing joy in a dream and the happiness of people in it is a sign of peace of mind, affirmation and psychological stability. See also: Interpretation of seeing joy in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing joy in a dream for a single girl: Seeing a single girl of joy in a dream is a sign of her strong desire to get married quickly. Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream In the presence of a friend of hers, or someone dear to her, is a sign of happy events in her life. Seeing a strange presence in a dream is a sign of improving the dreamer’s physical condition. Seeing a girl watching Farah in a dream is an indication of her great determination to achieve her goals and overcome all difficulties. What is the interpretation of seeing joy without music? In a dream: Seeing joy without music in a dream is an auspicious vision for its owner that indicates good news. Seeing joy in a dream and wearing black clothes in a dream is a sign of great sadness due to many problems and fears. Seeing signing a marriage contract in a dream is a sign of hearing sad news that raises great concern for its owner, such as a tragic incident. Or a great loss. See also: Interpretation of seeing a repeated marriage to the same person in a dream. Interpretation of seeing an unmarried girl attending a wedding in a dream: Seeing an unmarried girl watching joy and dancing with great joy is a sign of her being exposed to a severe psychological crisis due to the many problems in her life. Seeing a girl watching Joy in a dream is a sign of her control over her actions and her ability to make the right decisions. Seeing a girl watching her joy over someone who is not in the mood indicates her madness and bad behavior. See also: Interpretation of seeing a marriage proposal in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing the presence of joy in the house in a dream: Seeing the presence of joy in the house In a dream, it is a sign of trouble and great sadness in the dreamer’s life. Seeing a wedding party at home in a dream is a sign of a catastrophic disaster, such as a major accident or the loss of a loved one. Seeing a married woman going to rejoice in her home is a sign that we will soon hear good news. What is the interpretation of seeing joy in a dream? For a married woman: Seeing a married woman observing her joy again in a dream is a sign of family stability and overwhelming happiness with her husband. Seeing a married woman in the presence of a stranger in a dream is an indication of a feeling of comfort and psychological security. Seeing a married woman attending the joy of one of her family members, a relative or friend, is a sign of happy days. In h

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing my grandmother sick in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about seeing my grandmother sick in a dream is one of those dreams that causes anxiety, so we learn in the following lines about the interpretation of dreams about seeing my grandmother sick in a dream and other details. Interpretation of dreams about seeing my grandmother sick in a dreamInterpretation of dreams about seeing my grandmother sick in a dream can be a sign of recovery Of illness, and God knows the unseen. When the dreamer sees his grandmother sick in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer is feeling concerned about taking care of his grandmother, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees her grandmother sick in a dream, this may be evidence of her grandmother’s recovery, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about my grandmother’s wedding in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my grandmother’s marriage in a dream It can lead to the satisfaction of desires, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a single young man sees his grandmother getting married, this may be a sign of achieving goals, and God knows the unseen. When he sees a married woman whose grandmother got married, this indicates goodness, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees that her grandmother is getting married, this may indicate an abundance of food. And God is Most High and Most Knowing. The interpretation of a dream about my deceased grandmother praying in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about my deceased grandmother praying in a dream may be a sign of her high status, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees his deceased grandmother praying, he may be moved to the high rank of grandmother, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees his grandmother dead, this may indicate his need to Telling of his virtues, and God knows best. It can also indicate praiseworthy things, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of dreams about my sick grandmother walking in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my sick grandmother walking in a dream can lead to taking care of his grandmother, as he can express his concern for his grandmother’s condition, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees his grandmother A sick woman crying in a dream, this may be evidence of recovery from the disease, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees a sick grandmother walking in a dream, this may lead to recovery from the disease, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about my grandmother calling me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my grandmother calling me in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this, except that seeing a grandmother leads to goodness, and God knows best. When a married woman sees her grandmother in a dream, this could be evidence of a year full of goodness, God willing. If an unmarried girl sees her grandmother, this may lead to kindness and sustenance, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about my grandmother. On her deathbed in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my grandmother on her deathbed in a dream could be an indication of the difficulties faced by the dreamer, and God knows the unseen. When an unmarried girl sees her grandmother on her deathbed in a dream, this may lead to obstacles, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried young man sees He married his grandmother on her deathbed in a dream. This may indicate his distance from God, and God knows best. It could also indicate illness, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my grandmother cooking in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my grandmother cooking in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing your dead grandmother cooking in a dream could be a sign of good things, and God knows the unseen, as a single girl’s vision of her dead grandmother may indicate food.

title: Interpretation of injustice in a dream: seeing an oppressed person in a dream

preview.html: A dream about injustice for a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, for a man. If the oppressed person dreamed that I was being oppressed, I screamed from the injustice and injustice. I was dreaming of someone who had wronged me. Someone who wronged Ibn Sirin, and not just injustice in the dream. It is a very bad dream that afflicts the dreamer in a state of extreme sadness, depression, and intense crying, if he sees that he has been wronged in the dream by those close to him or by one of the other people, as injustice is one of the difficult matters that people suffer from in public life. Injustice causes a lot of oppression and sadness to men in public life. Injustice is one of the things that God and His Messenger have forbidden and he has called us not to oppress others and other matters. Interpretation of injustice in a dream Injustice in a dream indicates the acceleration of the demolition and destruction of homes. Whoever sees that he is oppressed in a dream is poor. Whoever dreams that he confesses his sin and then repents to God Almighty. Whoever sees that he is oppressed If someone prays for him, let him beware of the punishment of God Almighty. Whoever sees himself being oppressed prays for his oppressor, and the oppressed person will triumph over the oppressor. Whoever sees that his oppressor is defending him, this is good news, because he has the right to sue. Interpretation of injustice in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing injustice in a dream. Evidence that the dreamer will face many failures and sudden disasters in public life, and will fall into very great destruction and distraction, whether at home or at work and various other things. Seeing injustice in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will suffer from evil and problems and will have to be careful in all Things in his life. The dreamer’s vision that he fell under the influence of injustice and oppression and exposed them often in the dream is evidence that the dreamer will get rid of one of the sins of his life and become closer to God Almighty. We respect the dreamer’s vision that he is an unjust and tyrannical figure in public life who violates the rights of others. This is evidence of the need to return. To the right path and to stay away from any injustice to others. The dream is a clear message from God Almighty to the dreamer about the need to return. The dreamer also sees in the dream that he is raising his head to the sky and praying to God against the oppressors and those who wronged him. This is evidence that the dreamer will restore his rights in the near future and get rid of all... The darkness that exists within limits. Life, because it will become good soon. Also, the dreamer sees himself blaming himself for his injustice in the dream, evidence that the dreamer will return to the right path in the near future and that he will wake up from the slumber of prohibitions and whims, because he will be able to overcome them. Satanic whims in the life he walked in the past period. Seeing the dreamer being unfair to those in the dream is evidence that the dreamer will take a bad path and commit many sins. Interpretation of a prostitute in a dream: Whoever sees in a dream that a man has wronged him in any way in terms of Money or honor, the oppressor will compensate him with the same amount of what he oppressed, and the oppressed will be victorious, and the oppressor will be exposed to the world and its injustice. He comes, even if he is worthy of kingship, but his punishment is deserved, may God bless him. Interpretation of prostitution in a dream: A disease appears in the dream that descends until it must be cured. Some knowledgeable people said: With the corruption of the common people, the princes of injustice appear, and with the corruption of the elite, the

title: Interpretation of Egypt in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of Egypt in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail, as Egypt is the mother of the world, the land of Canaan, the land that God Almighty has preserved from all evil throughout the ages and which has been mentioned in the Holy Qur’an a lot, including the Almighty’s saying in Surat Al-Baqarah: “Go down to Egypt, and you will have what you asked for.” Mentioning the name Egypt is always associated with many good and benefits, but it brings the same good and benefit in a dream, and this is what you will learn from the following lines, according to the Muslim interpreter Ibn Sirin from the encyclopedia website. Interpretation of Egypt in a dream Interpretation of seeing travel to Egypt by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin indicated that Egypt is one of the blessed countries mentioned in the Holy Qur’an, and therefore it represents something worthy of praise in a dream because it is the land of the righteous, martyrs and those with beneficial knowledge who have had a positive impact on various aspects of Islam. Countries of the world. Whoever sees in his dream that he traveled to Egypt and set foot on its land and was a student or looking for a job, this vision gave him access to the highest levels of science and culture in the world, and it is also an indication that he obtained a prestigious job that would greatly facilitate his economic and social conditions. And whoever was unmarried and saw in a dream that he traveled to Egypt to marry one of its women, this is a good sign that God has given him a good share of abundant money and offspring of children. And whoever wanted to get married and saw himself traveling to Egypt, this is a sign of his marriage to a righteous woman of religion and good morals. And whoever was married but God did not allow him to have children because his wife was barren, and he came to him in a dream that he traveled and married one of her daughters, this is good news that his wife will remain pregnant soon and God knows best. Egypt has also always represented security and safety for those inside it, as God Almighty said: “And he said: Enter Egypt, God willing, in safety.” May God protect him and his family. Interpretation of dreams about a trip to Egypt for singles Seeing an unmarried woman traveling in Egypt shows many signs of safety, reassurance, and protection from all harm. Also, if she is unmarried and not Egyptian and dreams of traveling to Egypt and marrying one of its men, this vision indicates her relationship with a person of morals and religion who has high moral qualities such as courage, honesty, and courage, with whom she will be happy in her life, God willing. Also, seeing a trip to Egypt in a person’s dream in general is good news for achieving the desire he has been longing for, whether it is in the field of study, work, marriage, or anything he may desire for one day. Interpretation of a dream about traveling to Egypt for a married woman: Seeing Egypt in a married woman’s dream is one of the good things that portends the abundance of her strength, the spaciousness of her conditions, the alleviation of her worries, and her deliverance from problems and crises, God willing. Likewise, a married pregnant woman who dreams that she will travel to Egypt and give birth to her child there, this vision indicates that her child will be of great importance and occupy a prestigious position in the future, God willing. Seeing childbirth in Egypt for a married woman is one of the things that indicate that she has escaped crises, and it inspires hope and optimism in her life, and God knows best. Seeing knowledge

title: Getting out of the car in Al-Osaimi’s dream

preview.html: Getting out of the car in Al-Osaimi’s dream. The car is considered one of the most important means of transportation through which you can move from one place to another with ease without making any effort or feeling very tired. The most important things that were said about this dream. Getting out of the car in Al-Osaimi’s dream. Seeing getting out of the car in a dream indicates the dreamer’s reluctance to continue his journey on a certain subject and withdrawing from it for the sake of comfort and reassurance. If the dreamer sees himself getting out of the car in a dream, it symbolizes pride. And attachment to the point of view, and this is a message to get rid of this characteristic because it does not live up to it. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is getting out of the car and gets out of it, and it is black, this means that she will get rid of the severe pain and sadness that she suffered from. If the married woman sees that she She gets out of a car full of dust, this foretells that she will get rid of the problems and crises that she was facing at that time. When a pregnant woman dreams of getting out of the car, this means that her due date is approaching and she must prepare for that. If a divorced woman gets out of an old car in a dream, this means that she She will get rid of her past life and start a new page. If a single man dreams that he is getting out of a car, it is interpreted that he is close to marriage and the end of the period of celibacy. Secrets of Dream InterpretationThe expert includes a team of the best interpreters of dreams and visions in the country. The website is in Arabic. To access it, write a page on the Internet Secrets of Dream Interpretation on Google. Getting out of the car in a dream by Azab Al-Osaimi If an unmarried girl sees herself getting out of the car in a dream, this means that she will reach the desired goal and achieve many ambitions. And in the event that the dreamer sees that he is getting out of the car in the middle of The road, this indicates that some of the things he is striving for will stop the search indefinitely. If the dreamer is engaged and sees herself getting out of the car in a dream, this means that her wedding date will be postponed due to something beyond her control. And seeing the sleeping woman getting out Getting out of the car in a dream means that she will suffer from loneliness and restrictions, although she tends to be open. If the dreamer sees himself getting out of the car in a dream, this indicates that he is suffering from many emotional problems that may end. Getting out of the car in a dream for a married woman Al-OsaimiIf she dreamed For a married woman to get out of the car, this means that she will go through a period full of difficulties, but she will escape from it and comfort will come to her from everywhere. If the lady sees that the car is dirty and full of dirt, this symbolizes that her circumstances will change for the better and a new life will begin. And if the dreamer gets out of the car While he is walking in it, this means that she will leave her job, but she will be exposed to some financial crises. When the dreamer sees himself getting out of the car in a dream, this indicates that he will get rid of accumulated debts, pay them and open the doors to abundant livelihood. If the fortuneteller is sick and sees in a dream that she is getting out of a car that is not beautiful. This is foretelling

Seeing meat in a dream symbolizes a stable life and abundant money that the dreamer will soon obtain, God willing. Seeing the dreamer in a dream means overcoming the crises and problems that he has been suffering from for a long time. Also, seeing someone in a dream about meat is a sign of achieving the goals and aspirations that he has been striving for for a while. If you see meat in a dream and it is bad, this is a sign of debts and problems that the dreamer faces. title: Interpretation of a dream about raw shrimp in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about raw shrimp in a dream by Ibn Sirin, a dream about shrimp in a dream, which is a type of sea fish and has many different shapes and can be prepared in more than one way, and is distinguished by its wonderful, beautiful taste and very beneficial to the human body, and seeing shrimp in a dream has many signs that vary Its interpretations depend on the state of the fortuneteller and the circumstances surrounding him. Fish in general in a dream indicates kindness and a broad diet. Accordingly, the interpretation of a dream about raw shrimp in a dream will be recognized by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of raw shrimp in a dream by Ibn Sirin The interpretation of raw shrimp in a dream carries a number of interpretations that Ibn Sirin talked about. His vision of a single girl shows that it is good news and a sign of kindness and blessings that she will receive in her life, and it could be a sign of an upcoming marriage and other evidence for the interpretation of shrimp in a dream: If he eats raw shrimp in a dream, this indicates the end of crises and problems. Raw shrimp in a dream means getting On a high and new status. Buying raw shrimp in a dream suggests that it is a harbinger of dreams and aspirations coming true. Eating fried shrimp in a dream indicates peace of mind and the removal of all fears. Interpretation of raw shrimp in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees raw shrimp, this indicates a diet. It is wonderful that her husband may suffer from it and that she will get rid of all the haters in her life. The wonderful and delicious fish and the interpretation of raw shrimp in a dream for a married woman. The woman carries an accurate interpretation that shows the comfort and great benevolence that her husband will receive, and it will relieve her of all the grudges that she suffers from in his life, and it has been mentioned Some special indicators. Interpretation of raw shrimp in a dream for a single woman: When an unmarried girl sees shrimp in a dream, this means that happiness is coming to her and perhaps marriage soon. As for eating shrimp in a dream, this indicates that this woman enjoys success, a stable life, and the full achievement of goals, and when You see a lot of prawns in a dream, this indicates that there will be wedding parties for many friends and that there will be many occasions that he will attend and invite, so the interpretation of shrimp has multiple and wonderful connotations. Interpretation of raw shrimp in a dream for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of prawns for a pregnant woman in a dream is one of the things that indicates that she She will give birth to a boy, and if the pregnant woman wants to try eating shrimp and it tastes delicious, this means that her birth will be easy and easy. As it is a confirmation for the pregnant woman of her health and the health of her child, and this birth will be easy. It is not tiring for the mother or the child. Shrimps in a dream carry many interpretations, including meaning, comfort, and reassurance, and that God will honor the easy and simple matter. Among the dreams that we sometimes dream of is seeing shrimp in a dream, and there are many interpretations of shrimp, and accordingly, the interpretation of dreaming of raw shrimp in a dream was presented by Ibn Sirin and some other interpretations. .

title: Interpretation of a dream that I had intercourse with a man other than my husband, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I dreamed that I was having intercourse with a man other than my husband. Intercourse is one of the things that God has made permissible in worship, and it is between a man and his wife. If it is not like that, it is forbidden and is considered adultery. If a married woman sees that in a dream. She has intercourse with a man other than her husband, she is afraid of him and is looking for an interpretation of it, and scholars believe that this vision has many implications, and here in this article we examine together the most important things that have been said about this vision. I dreamed that I was in contact with a man other than my husband. Interpretation scholars say that a woman who sees that a man other than her husband is accompanying her in a dream portends many good things that will happen to her. The dreamer's vision in a dream that a man is connecting with her while she is in a high position symbolizes that she will achieve her ambitions and hopes and enjoy a happy life full of luxury in the coming period. And if the dreamer sees in a dream that a rich man is living with her, this symbolizes that he will soon receive a lot of kindness and abundant food. And if the dreamer sees that she is in a relationship with a man other than her husband and he is from the family, this symbolizes maintaining family ties or assuming an important position. And when the dreamer sees in a dream a man whom she loves only her husband, this means that she will face many enemies and defeat their evil. If the dreamer sees that she has sex with a man she knows in addition to her husband in a dream, this indicates the stability of married life. title: The full meaning of the interpretation of a dream about worms coming out of the leg

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about worms coming out of the leg: Some people feel anxious when they see worms in a dream, and this anxiety comes from a previous belief and an attitude based on the fact that worms are repulsive and repulsive, and this issue cannot be taken into consideration when interpreting dreams. The article mentioned all the signs of worms coming out of the leg. Interpretation of the dream of worms coming out of the leg: Seeing worms expresses a lot of money that a person earns from several sides, and the work through which he gains a lot of material and moral profits. According to Nabulsi, seeing worms symbolizes girls, education, and planting work. Values ​​and norms since childhood. As for seeing worms coming out of the body in general, this vision expresses freedom from a major predicament, freedom from serious restrictions, and freedom from imminent danger. If one sees worms coming out of his feet, this symbolizes the goals that one has achieved after Long suffering, extreme misery, and life’s problems that greatly exhausted his efforts and vitality. If the dreamer sees worms coming out of his leg, this indicates the many mistakes he has committed in the past, and the intention of correcting all of these mistakes and abandoning the bad ways he was walking. And if he sees worms coming out of His stomach, this is an indication of the end of a serious crisis in his life, avoiding the malice and malice of enemies and staying away from the paths they are taking. Seeing worms coming out of the leg also indicates extreme stress and extreme sadness that disappears after a long time, a feeling of malaise that applies to all aspects of a person’s life, and a tendency to find a way out. Suitable for ending this difficult matter. The situation. I see Ibn ShaheenIn general, worms are an indicator of three things: they could be prey that a person will reap in the coming days, an increase in offspring, or harm that can be caused to him. Interpretation of a dream about worms emerging from the leg, according to Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says in his interpretation of seeing worms in a dream The vision has more than one face. Seeing worms also portends many benefits, abundant money, long-lived offspring, health, and expanding offspring. As for seeing worms coming out of the foot, this indicates a feeling of guilt that the person regrets and tries to repent and return to God again. The vision may indicate a disturbance in interests, postponement of critical actions and decisions, and the passage of a difficult period in which a person loses a lot of his time, effort, and money. If a person sees a worm coming out of his leg, this symbolizes the presence of a person who feels jealous or hates him and creates problems for him and creates problems in his life that make him at odds with him. others. But if the dreamer sees silkworms emerging from his leg, this indicates concerns about life and participation in many projects aimed at achieving the greatest amount of profit. And if you see worms gathering around you, this indicates reaping a lot of benefits at once, or Gaining a lot of money as a result of some work, or an influx of children and a large number of offspring. And whoever sees in a dream that worms are coming out of his leg and hurting him, this indicates that there are those who are conspiring against him, and are searching in every possible way.

title: Interpretation of crying in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of crying in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. Visions and dreams are among the things he seeks most in his life, as he tries to interpret these dreams that always make him confused, as he tries to find out the main interpretation of them in all matters of his life, and this is what makes him constantly search for an interpretation of these Dreams. You will find that a dream usually has many reasons that make a person confused, as it is a sign from God Almighty about something, and there are many questions about the interpretation of crying in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, as many people try to learn the interpretation of dreams for crying in a dream, Because it is one of the most common dreams among people. Interpretation of crying in a dream Many people wonder about the interpretation of crying in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, as crying in a dream has many good and bad connotations, which makes the person anxious to know the reason for those tears that fall from him. In his dreams, it is one of the most difficult things that happens to him, especially when he wakes up, he finds traces of tears in his eyes, which makes him search for an explanation for these dreams, and after that we will learn about them. Interpretation of crying in a dream by Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi, as the two great scholars Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi interpreted these dreams on the basis of the Holy Qur’an and the Noble Prophet’s Sunnah. Interpretation of crying in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Many people try to learn the interpretation of crying in a dream from Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi, as it is one of the important and necessary matters in The lives of many people, and the Islamic scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted many dreams, including the interpretation of dreaming of crying in a dream. Serena: Crying and screaming: If someone is crying and screaming, this is severe pain and sadness for that person, but if no one is crying, this indicates that the person is exposed to many worries. Crying without screaming: means blessing and long life, and if crying is in the form of a group without screaming, This means the disappearance of worries, God Almighty willing. Crying while reciting the Qur’an: It is remembering the sins and disobedience that a person has committed, and this is evidence of their removal, God willing. Seeing a dead person crying: means that the dead person wants something from you and often has a debt that he wants you to pay. Interpretation Crying in a dream for Nabulsi: The Arab scholar Nabulsi will interpret many dreams, as he interpreted the dream of crying in a dream, and this indicates a lot of evidence, as crying in a dream has many indications that the dreamer should take into consideration, and in the context of discussing the interpretation of crying in dreams by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, Let us learn about the interpretation of crying from Al-Nabulsi: Crying while screaming, slapping, and wearing a black robe: means intense sadness and many fears for the person. Crying while listening to the Qur’an and remembering sins and regret: means pleasure, pleasure, and keeping worries away from you. Crying while reading the Qur’an and reading from it: means happiness, happiness, and purification from sins. Interpretation Crying in a dream by Ibn HishamSimilar to the interpretation of crying in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, many people try to take other points of view to interpret the dream of crying, as it is one of the difficult dreams that represents many...

Crying while reciting the Qur’an: It is remembering the sins and disobedience that a person has committed, and this is evidence of their removal, God willing. Seeing a dead person crying: means that the dead person wants something from you and often has a debt that he wants you to pay. Interpretation Crying in a dream for Nabulsi: The Arab scholar Nabulsi will interpret many dreams, as he interpreted the dream of crying in a dream, and this indicates a lot of evidence, as crying in a dream has many indications that the dreamer should take into consideration, and in the context of discussing the interpretation of crying in dreams by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, Let us learn about the interpretation of crying from Al-Nabulsi: Crying while screaming, slapping, and wearing a black robe: means intense sadness and many fears for the person. Crying while listening to the Qur’an and remembering sins and regret: means pleasure, pleasure, and keeping worries away from you. Crying while reading the Qur’an and reading from it: means happiness, happiness, and purification from sins.
